title: "html-08-using_summary_rows"
output:
  - html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
```

Create a display table with summary rows.

```{r}
# Input table
tbl <-
  dplyr::tribble(
    ~groups, ~rowname, ~value,  ~value_2,
    "A",     "1",      NA,      260.1,
    "A",     "2",      184.3,   84.4,
    "A",     "3",      342.3,   126.3,
    "A",     "4",      234.9,   NA,
    "B",     "1",      190.9,   832.5,
    "B",     "2",      743.3,   281.2,
    "B",     "3",      252.3,   732.5,
    "B",     "4",      344.7,   NA,
    "C",     "1",      197.2,   818.0,
    "C",     "2",      284.3,   394.4
  )
```

```{r}
# Create a display table with summary rows
summary_tbl <-
  tbl %>%
  gt(groupname_col = "groups") %>%
  summary_rows(
    groups = c("A", "C"),
    columns = "value",
    fns = list(
      ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
      ~sum(., na.rm = TRUE),
      ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE)
    )
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    footnote = "Note for Summary A.",
    locations = cells_summary(
      groups = "A",
      columns = value,
      rows = 1
    )
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    footnote = "Note for Summary C.",
    locations = cells_summary(
      groups = "C",
      columns = value,
      rows = 1
    )
  ) %>%
  fmt_missing(columns = c(value, value_2)) %>%
  tab_options(
    summary_row.background.color = "#FFFEEE",
    row_group.background.color = "lightblue"
  )
```

```{r}
# Show the table
summary_tbl
```

```{r}
# Extract the summary data frame from the table object
summary_tbl %>% extract_summary()
```
